title: Classic Rock Cover Night
description: Hit the Prairie Fire rooftop on Saturday, July 29th - we've got you covered! This no cover and all ages event promises nothing but the hits as you sing and dance along to you favorite classic rock covers performed live by the The Levitators! The music kicks off at 7pm.
short_description: Hit the Prairie Fire rooftop on Saturday, July 29th - we've got you covered!
